Shockwave/Unitron:




"Can't I just shoot ONE Maximal?" Unitron asked over comm., two laser bolts 
digging into an unimportant area in the back of his space fighter mode.  
"Kiss my aft!" he yelled, firing off a missile down towards Deemos.

Shockwave.  "No, we are not in a tactical position to do so," he intoned in 
reply, firing off five rapid laser bolts and a missile down at Depp, 
"continuing with your requests only wastest time and focus."
